Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Você veio se juntar a nós por vontade própria, {STR_leaderName}. Bom.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Estamos cansados de esperar, {STR_leaderName}. Renda-se agora e ficaremos unidos para sempre.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Em breve, todos serão um com o Vazio.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Diga a seus mestres para voltarem de onde vieram.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Veio me implorar para libertar sua mente, {STR_leaderName}?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Quanto maiores são, mais forte caem, {STR_leaderName}. Seus mestres não são diferentes.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Não é um deles? Então seja bem-vindo. O que deseja?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Salve, {STR_leaderName}. É bom ver um rosto amigo nestes tempos sombrios.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
É bom ver que está bem, apesar das circunstâncias.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Bem-vindo, amigo, fico feliz em ver que não perdeu a razão.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Resistir à maré dessas criaturas do Vazio não é tarefa fácil, amigo. Que possamos fazê-lo lado a lado no futuro.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Nossos objetivos se alinham, {STR_leaderName}. Uma aliança entre nós fortalecerá a determinação de nosso povo para lutar contra essas aberrações sombrias.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_otherName} defende bravamente seu povo, suas convicções e nosso mundo. São uma verdadeira inspiração!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Deixemos nossas diferenças mesquinhas de lado e nos unamos contra essa ameaça à nossa existência.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Please check to ame sure this still makes sense in game
Nós dois sabemos que vamos precisar de toda a ajuda possível contra as entidades do vazio. Com esse pacto, podemos nos ajudar. Está dentro?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Please check to ame sure this still makes sense in game
Esses sugadores de cérebros já foram longe demais! Divididos, só conseguimos fazer tão pouco, mas juntos somos o baluarte que este mundo precisa.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Please check to ame sure this still makes sense in game
Você é uma luz nestes tempos sombrios, {STR_leaderName}. É meu desejo que fortaleçamos os laços entre nós, para o bem de nossos povos.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Ver você bem fortalece minha determinação, {STR_leaderName}. Devemos nos esforçar para transformar nossa afiliação em uma aliança forte? Isso beneficiaria muito a nós dois.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Saudações, camarada. Você é um farol de esperança nestes tempos sombrios, e juntos seríamos muito mais fortes contra as forças que se opõem a nós.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Que bom ver você, amigo. Espero que esteja bem. Devíamos fortalecer o vínculo entre nós para ficarmos unidos contra a invasão dos Portadores do Vazio!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Tenho uma proposta para você: {STR_actionName}. Vamos encarar os fatos: este tratado nos ajudará a ficarmos mais fortes contra a maré de monstruosidades que se aproxima.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Estabilidade e força para proteger este mundo e nosso povo daqueles possuídos pelo vazio, é isso que este tratado nos ajudará a fazer, {STR_actionName}. Vai se juntar a mim?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Com o apoio de nosso novo mestre, conquistaremos este mundo e o governaremos como nosso!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. "Master" Refers to a genderless figure.
A Escuridão do Vazio acabará dominando você e seus aliados. É apenas uma questão de tempo.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. "Master" Refers to a genderless figure.
Você se alia a esses monstros para se salvar enquanto o resto de nós luta. É patético. Volte rastejando para seus mestres e reze para não nos encontrarmos no campo de batalha.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. "Master" Refers to a genderless figure.
Devíamos ficar juntos. Receio que possamos ser dominados por essas entidades sombrias do vazio se não o fizermos.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. "Master" Refers to a genderless figure.
Escravo Físico. Dissemine Nossa Energia. Consuma. Destrua os Renegados Físicos.
Thrall refers to the player. "Physical Renouncers" refers to enemies.
Não Vibre Seu Ar. Sacie Nossa Fome.
O Tempo Se Esgota Para Você.
Precisamos nos concentrar em repelir a invasão
This is the name of a modifier and is displayed in lists and breakdowns. May be inserted as strings, but never midway of a scentence.
